overview: Wishing to dispose of his wife, psychiatrist Dr. Elliott makes his patient Nina think that she suffers from a compulsion to kill. He drugs Nina, murders his wife and leaves evidence that points to Nina. The latter, pre-conditioned by Elliott, also thinks she is guilty.
tagline: Blood Red Lips... hungry for love... But Cursed By The Brand Of The Vampires!
title: Devil Bat's Daughter
